column4: I am not sure which channel to post this too, but I have an image which I suspect has a virus on it (some kinda spy software), what would be the best way to find out if I am right? (it would be a windows based virus)
windows based virus *mostly* doesnt run on linux architecture, use some windows app to make sure you are clean
i am on ubuntu right now.... can you recommend a program that runs on ubuntu that I could use?
I think I am, but I used a USB bootdrive just to be sure
